Name: Amend the State Constitution to lower the voting age for state and local elections to 16. (S.1016/A.5790)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and New York State voters to approve, S.1016/A.5790, which would amend the State Constitution to lower the voting age for state and local elections to 16
BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
